name: You Must be This Tall to Ride
name_original: You Must be This Tall to Ride
description:
You Must be This Tall to Ride

A game by Équipe Étoile for the JamNation game jam at Comiccon 2017.

It's not fair. Adults get to do what they want. Two kids want to ride the roller coaster and will do what it takes to be tall enough to ride!

Players must work together to succeed. With one kid walking and one kid balancing, a crash to the floor is an accident away!

Controls
A,D or Left,Right - Move Bottom Player
J,L - Move Top Player
Enter - Restart Level
Esc - Return To Main Menu

Équipe Étoile  is:

Simon-Albert Boudreault
Étienne Brunel-Leclerc

Anthony Cousineau
